title: Clinical: Quick Actions Tool Bar
body:
Clinical : Quick Actions

 The Quick Action Toolbar, which is located at the top of the patient's clinical record.

The Quick Action Toolbar allows you to perform common tasks and actions without having to switch over to another section of the patient's clinical record. The toolbar is only accessible from the Clinical tab in a patient's record, and is always visible at the top of the page, regardless of which type of clinical record you are working on.
 
Quick Actions Tool Bar - 
Letter Writer, Quick Script, Pathology Request, Radiology Request, Travel Medicine, MHR and Patient Education. 

Letter Writer

To Write Correspondence, click the Letter Icon on the quick action toolbar.
Medical Certificate Letter
To Write a Medical Certificate Letter, click the Medical Certificate Icon on the quick action toolbar.
Referral Letter to a Specialist
To Write a Referral to a Specialist, click the Specialist Letter Icon on the quick action toolbar.
Quick Script

To Write a Quick Script, click the Rx Icon on the quick action toolbar.

Pathology Request

To Create a Pathology Request, click the Pathology Icon on the quick action toolbar.



Radiology Request

To Create a Radiology Request, click the Radiology Icon on the quick action toolbar.


MHR

To Open MHR, click the MHR Icon on the quick action toolbar.


Patient Education

To Open Patient Education, click the Patient Education Icon on the quick action toolbar.

Print Current Consultation Notes
To Print the Current Consultation's Notes, click on More and then Print Today's Notes.
